plot: An operetta of old Spain with Jose Mojica as a swashbuckling adventurer who, despite tremendous odds, saves Manolita Saval from marrying a wicked nobleman.
title: El capitán aventurero
plot_es: An operetta of old Spain with Jose Mojica as a swashbuckling adventurer who, despite tremendous odds, saves Manolita Saval from marrying a wicked nobleman.
plot_en: An operetta of old Spain with Jose Mojica as a swashbuckling adventurer who, despite tremendous odds, saves Manolita Saval from marrying a wicked nobleman.
